events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to their request for money back or exchange.
The case has been assigned to Agent Mary Johnson for further assistance regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m Mary, and I’ll be helping you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been tried on or used?
The order number is 123456789, and I have only tried the jacket on indoors for sizing but haven’t worn it outside or washed it.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once you send the jacket back to us in its original condition. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you sending the label and will ship it back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting our support team.
